bike.description: C5 high-modulus aero carbon tubing, integrated seat clamp, integrated head tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: C5 high-modulus carbon aero stays w/ chainstays-mounted brake, vertical dropout w/ adjustment for wheel position

components.description: FC-440 carbon aero monocoque w/ 1 1/8" carbon steerer, integrated airfoil brakes
Oval 527 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H sealed bearing hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 60 tpi, 700c x 23mm
FSA No. 36 press-fit top/integrated bottom bearing, 1 1/8"
Oval 750 alloy base bar w/ 750 S bend alloy extensions
Oval R500T Triathlon w/ CrMo hollow rails
